schema

{
  query: Query
}

extend schema
  @link(url: "https://specs.apollo.dev/federation/v2.5", import: ["@key", "@shareable", "@external", "@requires"])

directive @link(url: String, as: String, for: link__Purpose, import: [link__Import]) repeatable on SCHEMA

directive @key(fields: federation__FieldSet!, resolvable: Boolean = true) repeatable on OBJECT | INTERFACE

directive @requires(fields: federation__FieldSet!) on FIELD_DEFINITION

directive @federation__provides(fields: federation__FieldSet!) on FIELD_DEFINITION

directive @external(reason: String) on OBJECT | FIELD_DEFINITION

directive @federation__tag(name: String!) repeatable on FIELD_DEFINITION | OBJECT | INTERFACE | UNION | ARGUMENT_DEFINITION | SCALAR | ENUM | ENUM_VALUE | INPUT_OBJECT | INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION | SCHEMA

directive @federation__extends on OBJECT | INTERFACE

directive @shareable repeatable on OBJECT | FIELD_DEFINITION

directive @federation__inaccessible on FIELD_DEFINITION | OBJECT | INTERFACE | UNION | ARGUMENT_DEFINITION | SCALAR | ENUM | ENUM_VALUE | INPUT_OBJECT | INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION

directive @federation__override(from: String!) on FIELD_DEFINITION

directive @federation__composeDirective(name: String) repeatable on SCHEMA

directive @federation__interfaceObject on OBJECT

directive @federation__authenticated on FIELD_DEFINITION | OBJECT | INTERFACE | SCALAR | ENUM

directive @federation__requiresScopes(scopes: [[federation__Scope!]!]!) on FIELD_DEFINITION | OBJECT | INTERFACE | SCALAR | ENUM

type Query {
  allProducts: [Product!]
  productById(id: String!): Product
  _entities(representations: [_Any!]!): [_Entity]!
  _service: _Service!
}

type Product
  @key(fields: "id")
  @shareable
{
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  variants: [Variant]
}

type Variant
  @key(fields: "sku")
  @shareable
{
  sku: ID!
  size: String!
  price: Float!
}

enum link__Purpose {
  """
  `SECURITY` features provide metadata necessary to securely resolve fields.
  """
  SECURITY

  """
  `EXECUTION` features provide metadata necessary for operation execution.
  """
  EXECUTION
}

scalar link__Import

scalar federation__FieldSet

scalar federation__Scope

scalar _Any

type _Service {
  sdl: String
}

union _Entity = Product | Variant

engineConfig.graphqlSchema:
schema {
  query: Query
}

directive @authenticated on ENUM | FIELD_DEFINITION | INTERFACE | OBJECT | SCALAR

directive @inaccessible on ARGUMENT_DEFINITION | ENUM | ENUM_VALUE | FIELD_DEFINITION | INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION | INPUT_OBJECT | INTERFACE | OBJECT | SCALAR | UNION

directive @requiresScopes(scopes: [[openfed__Scope!]!]!) on ENUM | FIELD_DEFINITION | INTERFACE | OBJECT | SCALAR

directive @tag(name: String!) repeatable on ARGUMENT_DEFINITION | ENUM | ENUM_VALUE | FIELD_DEFINITION | INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION | INPUT_OBJECT | INTERFACE | OBJECT | SCALAR | UNION

scalar openfed__Scope

"""Address"""
type Address {
  line1: String!
  postCode: String!
}

type Cart {
  lineItemsStock: [LineItemStock!]!
  id: ID!
  lineItems: [LineItem!]!
  shippingAddress: Address
  billingAddress: Address
  shippingMethod: String
  canCheckout: Boolean!
}

"""Line item"""
type LineItem {
  id: ID!
  productId: String!
  sku: String!
  quantity: Int!
  variant: Variant!
  product: Product!
}

"""Stock of a line item"""
type LineItemStock {
  stock: Int!
  sku: ID!
}

type Query {
  cart(cartId: String!): Cart!
  orderById(id: String!): Order
  ordersByUserId(userId: String!): [Order!]
  allProducts: [Product!]
  productById(id: String!): Product
  allShippingMethods: [ShippingMethod!]
  allUsers: [User!]
  userById(id: String!): User
}

"""Variant"""
type Variant {
  sku: ID!
  size: String!
  price: Float!
  stock: Int!
}

type Order {
  id: ID!
  lineItems: [LineItem!]!
  shippingAddress: Address
  billingAddress: Address
  shippingMethod: ShippingMethod
}

type Product {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  variants: [Variant]
}

type ShippingMethod {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  price: Float
}

type User {
  id: ID!
  orders: [Order!]!
  email: String!
  firstName: String!
  lastName: String!
  addresses: [UserAddress!]!
}

enum link__Purpose {
  """
  `SECURITY` features provide metadata necessary to securely resolve fields.
  """
  SECURITY
  """
  `EXECUTION` features provide metadata necessary for operation execution.
  """
  EXECUTION
}

scalar link__Import

scalar federation__FieldSet

scalar federation__Scope

type UserAddress {
  id: ID!
  key: String!
  line1: String!
  postCode: String!
}

schema {
  query: Query
}

directive @authenticated on ENUM | FIELD_DEFINITION | INTERFACE | OBJECT | SCALAR

directive @composeDirective(name: String!) repeatable on SCHEMA

directive @extends on INTERFACE | OBJECT

directive @external on FIELD_DEFINITION | OBJECT

directive @inaccessible on ARGUMENT_DEFINITION | ENUM | ENUM_VALUE | FIELD_DEFINITION | INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION | INPUT_OBJECT | INTERFACE | OBJECT | SCALAR | UNION

directive @interfaceObject on OBJECT

directive @key(fields: openfed__FieldSet!, resolvable: Boolean = true) repeatable on INTERFACE | OBJECT

directive @link(as: String, for: String, import: [String], url: String!) repeatable on SCHEMA

directive @override(from: String!) on FIELD_DEFINITION

directive @provides(fields: openfed__FieldSet!) on FIELD_DEFINITION

directive @requires(fields: openfed__FieldSet!) on FIELD_DEFINITION

directive @requiresScopes(scopes: [[openfed__Scope!]!]!) on ENUM | FIELD_DEFINITION | INTERFACE | OBJECT | SCALAR

directive @shareable on FIELD_DEFINITION | OBJECT

directive @tag(name: String!) repeatable on ARGUMENT_DEFINITION | ENUM | ENUM_VALUE | FIELD_DEFINITION | INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION | INPUT_OBJECT | INTERFACE | OBJECT | SCALAR | UNION

"""Address"""
type Address {
  line1: String! @shareable
  postCode: String! @shareable
}

type Cart @key(fields: "id") @extends {
  billingAddress: Address
  canCheckout: Boolean! @requires(fields: "lineItemsStock { stock sku }")
  id: ID!
  lineItems: [LineItem!]!
  lineItemsStock: [LineItemStock!]! @external
  shippingAddress: Address
  shippingMethod: String
}

"""Line item"""
type LineItem @key(fields: "id") @extends {
  id: ID! @shareable
  productId: String! @shareable
  quantity: Int! @shareable
  sku: String! @shareable
  variant: Variant! @shareable
}

"""Stock of a line item"""
type LineItemStock @key(fields: "sku") @extends {
  sku: ID! @external
  stock: Int! @external
}

type Query {
  cart(cartId: String!): Cart!
}

"""Variant"""
type Variant @key(fields: "sku") @extends {
  price: Float! @shareable
  size: String! @shareable
  sku: ID! @shareable
}

scalar openfed__FieldSet

scalar openfed__Scope

  query: Query
}

type Query {
  allUsers: [User!]
  userById(id: String!): User
}

type User @key(fields: "id") {
  addresses: [UserAddress!]!
  email: String!
  firstName: String!
  id: ID!
  lastName: String!
}

type UserAddress @key(fields: "id") {
  id: ID!
  key: String!
  line1: String!
  postCode: String!
}

scalar link__Import

enum link__Purpose {
  """
  `EXECUTION` features provide metadata necessary for operation execution.
  """
  EXECUTION
  """
  `SECURITY` features provide metadata necessary to securely resolve fields.
  """
  SECURITY
}
